categories.title: Travelling to our Honeymoon Destination
categories.description: Our honeymoon is all booked and the cost is covered; we'll be jetting off to Mauritius and staying in the lovely 4-star resort of Solana Beach in the north west of the island.

categories.description: Whilst we're enjoying ourselves and relaxing with our all-inclusive package, we don't have any adventures planned. If you have any ideas for good honeymoon adventures in Mauritius, please gift towards one of:
